content.name: Luke Phan
content.review_title: my best HOME hotel in Ho Chi Minh City
content.review_content: I , my wife and my son stayed here for 4 nights. i planed to stay here for 1 night to have time to find another hotel to stay. but we didn’t think that this place is too good to stay. it was over my expectations.That I decided to stay for my whole trip time in HCM city.it is like a home to live especially we have 1 child stay with us. it is really convenient with kitchen, good refrigerator, electric cooker, bowls, plates.... it is good to prepare foods for our kid. we cooked food by ourselves, it is like my home in HCM city. Im a tour guide i stayed in many hotel in everywhere in Viet Nam but this Cozrum Home is the best hotel . I highly recommend everyone if you want to find a hotel to stay. price is reasonable. room is clean and staffs there are so friendly.im sure that you

content.name: LAN KIM
content.review_content: Phòng sạch sẽ, tiện nghi, vị trí trung tâm rất tiện cho việc đi lại, đặc biệt nhân viên nhiệt tình hỗ trợ khách. Cozrum Homes có nhiều chi nhánh,Website thiết kế rất thuận tiện cho khách book phòng theo nhu cầu của mình.
content.reviewer_location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam

hotel.location: 80A Bến Vân Đồn Phường 9, Quận 4, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
hotel.name: Cozrum Homes Riverside Bến Vân Đồn
